p: Starting compound 2a (0.218 g, 9.70 × 10 −4 mol) and using m-chloroperbenzoic acid (0.434 g, 2.51 × 10 −3 mol), compound 3a was obtained as a yellow oil (0.016 g, 7% yield). R f = 0.30 (ethyl acetate/light petroleum 1:10). 1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400 MHz): δ H = 1.04 (3H, t, J = 7.6 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 1.82–1.91 (2H, m, OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 2.55 (1H, q, J = 2.8 Hz CH 2 oxirane), 2.76–2.87 (3H, m, CH 2Ph and CH 2 oxirane), 3.12–3.17 (1H, m, CH oxirane), 3.86 (3H, s, OCH 3), 3.97 (2H, t, J = 6.8 Hz, OC H 2 CH 2CH 3), 6.76–6.84 (2H, m, H-2 and H-6), 6.83 (1H, d, J = 8.0 Hz, H-5) ppm. 13C NMR (CDCl 3, 100.6 MHz): δ C = 10.39 (OCH 2CH 2 CH 3), 22.47 (OCH 2 CH 2CH 3), 38.27 ( CH 2Ph), 46.78 ( CH 2 oxirane), 52.57 ( CH oxirane) 55.99 (O CH 3), 70.59 (O CH 2CH 2CH 3), 112.79 (C-2), 113.13 (C-5), 120.94 (C-6), 129.72 (C-1), 147.36 (C-4), 149.36 (C-3) ppm. HRMS: m/z (ESI) calculated for C 13H 18NaO 3 [M+Na] + = 0245.1148; found = 245.1148.
